title: Reinforcement Learning
recommended_materials: AIMA: Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach, 4ed, by Stuart Russell and Peter Norvig, [https://aima.cs.berkeley.edu/](https://aima.cs.berkeley.edu/).  US or Global Edition
PMLAI: Probabilistic Machine Learning: An Introduction [https://probml.github.io/pml-book/book1.html](https://probml.github.io/pml-book/book1.html)
technology_requirements: Computer capable of accessing the internet and running compilers, interpreters, and text editors
